about_the_game:
The soundtrack of the game 8-in-1 IQ Scale Bundle.

Genre: Soundtrack
Tempo: Fast
Mood: Driving, Uplifting, Mysterious

Once downloaded, MP3 files can be found in the 8-in-1 IQ Scale Bundle Steam directory.
...\Steam\SteamApps\common\8-in-1 IQ Scale Bundle\Soundtrack

Track listing:
1. Opus One (3:37)
